data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.

data.description: Produces melee infantry units.

data.name: Blacksmith
data.description: Houses technology to improve infantry and cavalry.

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Capital Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.

data.name: Chamber of Commerce
data.description: Acts as a Market. Trains one free Trader for each economic technology researched.

variations.name: Chamber of Commerce
variations.description: Acts as a Market. Trains one free Trader for each economic technology researched.

data.name: College of Artillery
data.description:
Produces the Royal Artillery versions of the Cannon, Ribauldequin, and Culverin, which do +30% more damage.
Unlocks the Artillery ability for Cannons trained from the College of Artillery.
Contains Siege and Gunpowder Technologies, trains units and researches technologies 50% faster.

variations.name: College of Artillery
variations.description:
Produces the Royal Artillery versions of the Cannon, Ribauldequin, and Culverin, which do +30% more damage.
Unlocks the Artillery ability for Cannons trained from the College of Artillery.
Contains Siege and Gunpowder Technologies, trains units and researches technologies 50% faster.

data.name: Dock
data.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.

variations.name: Dock
variations.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.

data.name: Farm
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

variations.name: Farm
variations.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Farm.
Only one Villager can work each Farm.

data.name: Guild Hall
data.description: Generates and stores resources over time, the more resources stored the faster they are generated. Select between Food, Wood, Stone, or Gold. Generates stone at half the rate.

variations.name: Guild Hall
variations.description: Generates and stores resources over time, the more resources stored the faster they are generated. Select between Food, Wood, Stone, or Gold. Generates stone at half the rate.

data.description: Increases your maximum Population.

data.name: Keep
data.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.

variations.name: Keep

data.name: Monastery
data.description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.

data.name: Palisade Wall
data.description:
Light defensive wall for quickly fortifying an area.
Initially costs 21 Wood, with each additional section costing 7 Wood.

variations.description:

data.name: Red Palace
data.description:
Acts as a Keep. Features high-damage arbalest emplacements. Each garrisoned unit adds an additional arbalest.
Activates an Arbalest emplacement on all Keeps and Town Centers.

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +2.

variations.name: Stone Wall
variations.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +2.

data.name: Stone Wall Gate
data.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.

variations.name: Stone Wall Gate
variations.description:
Heavy defensive gate. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the gate to access the top of the walls.

data.name: Stone Wall Tower
data.description:
Heavy defensive tower that fires a springald. Must be built on a Stone Wall segment.
Infantry can use the tower to access the top of the walls.
